response.overview: This short is a love letter to my younger self along to my parents for the sacrifices they've made for me. This film is very personal to me & the start of a new chapter in my abilities as a story teller. My art teacher told me "An artist of your skill needs to go bigger to get better" & that stuck with me. This is that. This is my skills improving as a story teller & creative.
response.title: First-Gen Artist
